name: Cool Down My Face
description:
Hey! You're a ball of ice! It's 40 degrees outside mate you gotta roll around my face and cool me down!

Put out fires to combo!

Jump and the combo is over!

Roll around with the arrows or your analogue stick!

You can jump (or start) with z or joystick 0!

(Made in two weeks for the Little Awful Jam 2016! http://www.awfuljams.com/little-awful-2016)
